name: trustpilot-review
author: PteroCA Community
description: Prompts users to leave a Trustpilot review when their server is expiring soon. Shows a popup widget on the dashboard when servers are within X days of expiration.

enabled.label: Enable Plugin
enabled.help: Enable or disable the Trustpilot review plugin globally

days_before_expiry.label: Days Before Expiry
days_before_expiry.help: Number of days before server expiry to show the review popup

review_url.label: Trustpilot Review URL
review_url.help: The URL where users will be redirected to leave a review

enable_widget.label: Enable Dashboard Widget
enable_widget.help: Show the Trustpilot review widget on the user dashboard

popup_title.label: Popup Title
popup_title.help: Title displayed on the review popup

popup_message.default: Your server is expiring soon. If you've enjoyed our service, we'd love to hear your feedback on Trustpilot!
popup_message.label: Popup Message
popup_message.help: Message displayed on the review popup
